questions.title: FED cuts interest rate by 25 bp – what do you do?
questions.context: The US Federal Reserve has cut the interest rate by 25 basis points. The market reacts positively to the loose monetary policy.
questions.explanation: Loose monetary policy supports risk assets – positive in the short term.

questions.title: BTC +5% in 24h, CPI tomorrow – your move?
questions.context: Bitcoin is rising strongly, but important inflation data will be published tomorrow.

questions.title: ETH Merge successful – long-term strategy?
questions.context: Ethereum has successfully switched to Proof-of-Stake. Energy consumption drops by 99%.
questions.explanation: Fundamental improvement, but diversification remains important.
